name: Alabaster, the wizard
text: Ah, a fresh breeze blows with your arrival, young traveler! Welcome to Telmaron, the island where dreams dance like fireflies in the night. I am Alabaster, the village’s wizard, and I must say, the stars have whispered of your coming. What brings you to our quaint little abode?

name: Alabaster, the wizard
text: Ah, a second welcoming to an ever-curious soul, I see! The island of Telmaron embraces you like an old friend. I am Alabaster, the resident wizard here, at your humble service. Tell me, what seekers' quest has guided your steps to our magical village?
